Package hk.edu.hkmu.lib.acq

Class EmailReportBySubjectAlma

java.lang.Object
hk.edu.hkmu.lib.acq.EmailReportBySubjectAlma
public class EmailReportBySubjectAlma
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used by the class AcqNewArrivalMonthReportBySch under hk.edu.ouhk.lib to email the fetched reports for Alma.
Since:
July 24 29, 2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Wai-yan NG

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EmailReportBySubjectAlma()
    Initialize an object; in order to send an email report; report file must be set via setReportFileStr() and sendEmail() must be called.
    EmailReportBySubjectAlma​(java.lang.String reportFileStr)
    Initialize an object and an email report will be send right after this; the report file must in the form [schCode]-[any string].[extension].

  • Constructor Details

    • EmailReportBySubjectAlma

      public EmailReportBySubjectAlma()
      Initialize an object; in order to send an email report; report file must be set via setReportFileStr() and sendEmail() must be called.

    • EmailReportBySubjectAlma

      public EmailReportBySubjectAlma​(java.lang.String reportFileStr)
      Initialize an object and an email report will be send right after this; the report file must in the form [schCode]-[any string].[extension].
      Parameters:
      reportFileStr - the FULL path of the pre-recorded file; the file must exist before and in the form [schCode]-[any string].[extension].

  • Method Details

    • sendEmail

      public void sendEmail()
      sendEmail report, assuming setReportFileStr() is properly called.

    • setReportFileStr

      public void setReportFileStr​(java.lang.String reportFileStr)
      Set the report file string and the school code.
      Parameters:
      reportFileStr - The full path of the file and the file name must in the form [schCode]-[any string].[extension] and exist in the file system.

    • setTos

      public void setTos​(java.lang.String str)
      Set the recipient email address.'.
      Parameters:
      str - The string of email address separated by ','.
